uhm, it might have worked better if you took a screenshot in-game, and then overlayed a fire effect. Just a tip.

I think it's hilarious how unnecessary it was to cut a section of it off.

need I point out that mushroom clouds do not happen in the vacuum of space?

They happen when an explosion is close to the ground and the wave ricochets off of the surface and then atmosphere creates convections.Without the atmo the explosion would just be a cone of fire with a perpendicular ring i think.

As to this its so bad its actually kinda good.

Fire cannot be created with out oxygen :|

I have laughed for a solid ten minutes now at how ridiculous this picture is. Worth its weight in gold, man. At least you have the bawls to try... I'd hate to see what kind of godawful creations I'd make...
